title: LoLClient starting but not opening
body:
So since patch 6.21 came out, the LoLClient won't open anymore.
It's starting because the process is there but not opening.
Thanks for further help.

replies.body:
Ensure you've configured League to run with the administrative privileges it requires by following our [system permissions guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
I always lunch LoL with admin rights :s

In that case, your patcher could be blocked by your Firewall or Antivirus. [Configure your Antivirus/Firewall](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3) to allow League to operate as it does, or temporarily disable/uninstall your Antivirus/Firewall to see if League can launch.

Let me know if anything changed.
